function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of general facility design for different patient conditions and operational requirements may lead to increased risk of viral transmission within the hospital or healthcare facility.","Impact":"Increased potential for the spread of contagious diseases among patients and healthcare workers, leading to more severe outbreaks and higher rates of infection.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive risk assessments to evaluate the impact of design decisions on disease transmission. Implement measures such as improved ventilation, isolation capabilities, and enhanced triage systems.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, decentralized mechanical or passive ventilation, multifunctional facades with heat recovery, and 100% outside air delivery.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and staff within the hospital or healthcare facility.","Owner":"Architects, designers, building operators, and healthcare administrators."}]}
